content.prompt: In individuals with iron-rich diets, intracellular levels of iron are higher than in individuals with iron-poor diets. Which of the following best explains how organisms regulate ferritin protein levels in response to available iron?

choices.label: Translation of ferritin mRNA is inhibited in the presence of iron.
Translation of ferritin mRNA is stimulated by iron.
Ferritin protein is more stable in the presence of iron.
Ferritin protein is less stable in the presence of iron.

skill.text: 6.D: Explain the relationship between experimental results and larger biological concepts, processes, or theories.
